item.title: Creole add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "A lot of the conflict you have in your life exists simply because you're not living in alignment; you're not be being true to yourself." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Creole add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Live authentically. Why would you continue to compromise something that's beautiful to create something that is fake?" -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Creole add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Creole add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "There is nothing more beautiful than seeing a person being themselves. Imagine going through your day being unapologetically you." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Creole add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Creole add a quote by Brennan Manning
item.description: "Accepting the reality of our sinfulness means accepting our authentic self. Judas could not face his shadow; Peter could. The latter befriended the impostor within; the former raged against him." -- Brennan Manning
